alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 6:05PM EST until March 08 at 4:36AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Miamitown. Great Miami River at Sidney. Great Miami River near Middletown. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Miami River at Sidney. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, The river approaches the bank on the west side of Custenborder Field. At stages above 10 feet, city officials begin flood operations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 PM EST Monday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:30 PM EST Monday was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested. The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
